a:1:{i:0;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:38:"Bar Chart - Average Salaries by Sector";s:7:"content";s:426:"

The bar chart shows the average salaries (in dollars) for males and females across five different sectors (Professional, Managerial, Manufacturing, Trades, and Retail) in the years 2005 and 2015.

";}}
